full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Ethernet Switch

#### Tender Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Title** | Ethernet Switch |
| **Reference Number** | PW-CAG-010-28770 |
| **Publication Date** | August 11, 2022 |
| **Closing Date** | September 9, 2022, 2:00 PM ET |
| **Tender Status** | Expired |

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

The Government of Canada's Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites tender proposals for the acquisition of an Ethernet Switch for the Dash 8 aircraft of Transport Canada's Air Services Directorate. This tender is part of the Supply Arrangement (SA) T8493-140035 Series.

#### Background

Transport Canada requires an Ethernet Switch (PN: AE101264-004) for its Dash 8 aircraft. PWGSC will be procuring this requirement through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process. The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified suppliers who have been invited to bid on this requirement.

#### Scope of Work

The successful supplier will be required to provide one (1) Ethernet Switch to meet the needs of Transport Canada.

#### Solicitation Information

* Tender Reference Number: PW-CAG-010-28770
* Solicitation Number: T8493-220027/A
* Publication Date: August 11, 2022
* Closing Date: September 9, 2022, 2:00 PM ET

#### Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this tender should be directed to Edmond Egikian, Contracting Officer, at:

Edmond Egikian
Acquisitions Branch
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector (LAEPSS)
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)/Government of Canada
11 Laurier Street - PDP III, 8C1, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Phone: 343-572-4437
Email: [edmond.egikian@tpsgc.pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edmond.egikian@tpsgc.pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Qualification Process

A Notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.
